about_the_game:
The encouragement and backing from our community has got the WW1 FPS game Tannenberg to where it is today. This Supporter Edition contains all kinds of bonus content for the most dedicated fans.
The supporter edition includes:
  • Special Supporter Medal
  • Scoreboard Star icon
  • Official Tannenberg Soundtracks (20 Minutes)
  • Tannenberg Artwork incl. wallpapers, squad icons, character and weapon renders
  • Bonus Career Points to unlock new weapon loadouts faster
  • Film Memoir mode, which changes your view to that of a WW1 era film reel. Black and white, film grain effects, and audio details complete the effect. Make your own WW1 documentaries!
And above all, our sincere gratitude! We’re looking forward to continue supporting the WW1 Game Series.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
Gore and blood can be disabled completely with an in-game setting.

detailed_description:
The encouragement and backing from our community has got the WW1 FPS game Tannenberg to where it is today. This Supporter Edition contains all kinds of bonus content for the most dedicated fans.
The supporter edition includes:
  • Special Supporter Medal
  • Scoreboard Star icon
  • Official Tannenberg Soundtracks (20 Minutes)
  • Tannenberg Artwork incl. wallpapers, squad icons, character and weapon renders
  • Bonus Career Points to unlock new weapon loadouts faster
  • Film Memoir mode, which changes your view to that of a WW1 era film reel. Black and white, film grain effects, and audio details complete the effect. Make your own WW1 documentaries!
And above all, our sincere gratitude! We’re looking forward to continue supporting the WW1 Game Series.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7750 or higher, 1GB video card memory
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer only, make sure you have a stable and fast internet connection.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7750 or higher, 1GB video card memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer only, make sure you have a stable and fast internet connection.

name: Tannenberg - Supporter Edition Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7750 or higher, 1GB video card memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer only, make sure you have a stable and fast internet connection.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB video card memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: With the Supporter Edition you will receive several exclusive materials such as the Tannenberg soundtrack, the black and white Film Memoir mode, an artwork collection, a special medal, a scoreboard icon and extra career points for even more variety from the moment you start playing!
